title: Commonwealth Review. No. 10
brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: Commonwealth teams in action in the bobsleigh and ice hockey events of the Winter Olympic Games; Parliamentarians see Malaysia’s Rural Development Scheme; The natural asphalt of Trinidad and Tobago; Susan, a British circus elephant is also employed by a garage to move broken-down vehicles; Training in Occupational Therapy; The British tour of New Zealand Rugby Union Team.
